activeRumors.text: official threat: an old map fragment says Dunixe heard of guards buying lamp oil in bulk (from Marren's Eve).
The Bridge Lodge watches the markets quietly.

Travelers speak of Sibragtus Packmaster. The roads grow dangerous.
A battle was fought near Shitettin. Blood stains the earth.
conflicting treasure: a border scout says Emambe heard of bandits offering odd coins (from Marren's Eve).

npcs.name: Sivis

relationships.history: Only one of them can have what they both want.
Saw potential where others saw nothing.
The old ways, passed down in secret.
Forgiveness is not forthcoming.

storyThreads.title: What Sleeps Beneath Shitettin
storyThreads.summary: Ancient wards fail. What they imprisoned walks again.
potentialOutcomes: The evil is resealed, but weakened watchers remain.
The evil is destroyed at tremendous cost.
The evil proves to be misunderstoodnot evil at all.
The evil escapes and begins its conquest.
A bargain is struck with the awakened power.

storyThreads.title: Exodus from hex:5,6
storyThreads.summary: A great movement of peopleor creaturespasses through hex:5,6.
potentialOutcomes: The migrants find a new home.
The migrants are turned back or destroyed.
The migrants conquer rather than settle.

storyThreads.title: A Star Ascends
storyThreads.summary: Maud is becoming someone to watch.
potentialOutcomes: They achieve their ambition and more.
They become what they once despised.
They lift others as they climb.
